パッケージ com.kazurayam.materialstore.diagram.dot

クラス DotGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.kazurayam.materialstore.diagram.dot.DotGenerator
public class DotGenerator extends Object
generates a DOT script with which you can draw diagrams of the objects using GraphViz
